reviews.review_content:
Josh is wonderful. This is the perfect class for anyone interested in Poetry, whether you are just starting out or you have a full portfolio of work. The class provides a good intro to a wide range of poetical styles and structures. Josh is extremely helpful, laid-back, and not afraid to give honest, constructive criticism on your work.
Workload:
One poem
per week.
Readings
enjoyable.

Great class with a great professor. Josh is a cool, laid back guy and full of insightful, thought provoking things to say about poetry. We covered a whole bunch of poetic forms. Half the class was looking at student's writing and the other half looking discussing the week's form or style with reference to published poets - both well-known and contemporary. 
Workload:
Weekly writing assignments, reading assignments.
